mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, password, real_name, phone, email, role, class_id, room_id, status) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{role}, #{classId}, #{roomId}, #{status})
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_user SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE class_id = #{classId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE role LIKE CONCAT('%', #{role}, '%') AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT u.*, c.class_name, r.room_number, b.building_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_class c ON u.class_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_room r ON u.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_building b ON r.building_id = b.id WHERE u.deleted_at IS NULL
AND (u.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY CASE WHEN u.role LIKE '%ADMIN%' THEN 1 WHEN u.role LIKE '%TEACHER%' THEN 2 WHEN u.role LIKE '%INSPECTOR%' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, u.id ASC
